task.maidspell.spell_combat_melee.desc: Maid uses equipped spell books for spell attacks. Supports spell books in offhand, mainhand or backpack.
task.maidspell.spell_combat_far.desc: Maid uses equipped spell books for spell attacks. Supports spell books in offhand, mainhand or backpack.
task.maidspell.spell_combat_far.conditio: Requires equipped spell book (offhand, mainhand or backpack)
task.maidspell.spell_combat_melee.condit: Requires equipped spell book (offhand, mainhand or backpack)
item.maidspell.bleeding_heart.desc2: Converts 10% of damage dealt to enemies into health
item.maidspell.bleeding_heart.desc3: Heals both the maid and master
item.maidspell.flow_core.desc2: Continuously heals maid, healing (2.5%*favorability*max health) every 0.5s
item.maidspell.flow_core.desc3: Reduces damage taken, damage reduction: (15%*favorability level)
itemGroup.touhou_little_maid_spell: Touhou Little Maid: Master of All Spells
item.maidspell.quick_chant_ring.desc2: Reduces spell cooldown by 25% per maid favorability level
item.maidspell.spring_ring.desc2: Increases damage by same percentage as maid's lost health percentage
item.maidspell.double_heart_chain.desc2: Maid and master share damage taken
item.maidspell.rock_crystal.desc1: A magical crystal solid as bedrock
item.maidspell.blue_note.desc1: Right-click to open spell collection interface
item.maidspell.blue_note.desc2: Used to mark Iron's Spells spells
item.maidspell.blue_note.desc3: Marked spells will be cast on the master
item.maidspell.hairpin.desc1: Two families united in marriage, bound by vows
item.maidspell.hairpin.desc2: Maid's damage is reduced by master's defense calculations before being applied
item.maidspell.hairpin.desc4: Favorability Level 3: Immune to negative effects
item.maidspell.hairpin.desc5: Maid gains +1 favorability when eating food
item.maidspell.chaos_book.desc2: Delivers maid's damage to target in 5 separate hits
item.maidspell.chaos_book.desc3: Maid deals additional true damage equal to 1% of target's health (minimum 5) per attack
item.maidspell.soul_book.desc2: Maid cannot take damage exceeding 20% of maximum health
item.maidspell.soul_book.desc3: Negates damage if received within 0.5s of previous damage
item.maidspell.ender_pocket.desc1: A mysterious pouch connecting to ender space
item.maidspell.ender_pocket.desc2: Allows remote access to maid backpacks
item.maidspell.ender_pocket.desc3: Press bind key to open maid selection interface
key.categories.touhou_little_maid_spell: Touhou Little Maid: Master of All Spells
gui.maidspell.ender_pocket.title: Ender Pocket
gui.maidspell.ender_pocket.button.descri: Click to open maid selection panel
gui.maidspell.ender_pocket.maid.name: Maid: %s
item.maidspell.wound_rime_blade.desc2: Prevents healing effects on attacked enemies
item.maidspell.wound_rime_blade.desc3: The wounds it creates never heal
item.touhou_little_maid_spell.wind_seeki: Can locate the nearest Hidden Retreat
Bell guides your path, breeze brings blessings
The nearest Hidden Retreat is at [%s, %s, %s] (%s blocks away)
Click to add teleport command to chat

Ring the bell to call cherry blossoms
Gentle wind comes through the silent deep forest
Old friend waits with flowers
item.touhou_little_maid_spell.owner_clea: Right-click on maid to clear owner
Only usable by creative mode players and operators
You don't have permission to use this tool
item.maidspell.soul_book.desc4: Protects maid and master from abnormal damage sources
